content:
Hello! 👋 I’m Venu, a Senior Software Engineer based in Wellington, New Zealand. I specialize in developing tools and pipeline that empower artists to create digital visual effects for film and television. Currently at Weta FX, my focus is with the Creatures department, where I help bring epic fantasies like Avatar and Kingdom of the Apes to life. You can find a comprehensive overview of my career and projects on my LinkedIn profile.
I envision this website as a hybrid space, blending my professional work and personal projects with my interests in investing, travel, books, and podcasts, alongside various musings on life.
